title: Large-Scale Analogy-Based Elementary AI Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical/computational thinking and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening elementary AI education design competencies for mathematics majors or pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: They can develop an AI concept explanation framework suitable for elementary learners through human-AI comparison.
The operational principles of AI algorithms can be designed through visual/experiential activities applying analogy-based instructional methods
A tool can be developed to measure learners' understanding of AI ethics and critical thinking skills through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
